alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 8:28PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Collier and southeastern Hendry Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 828 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Big Cypress Seminole Reservation to 9 miles southwest of Hendry Correctional. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hendry Correctional, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Big Cypress National Preserve, Miles City and Sunniland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
